metadata.title: CVE-2014-2056 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: PHPDocX, as used in ownCloud Server before 5.0.15 and 6.0.x before 6.0.2,allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files, cause a denial of service,or possibly have other impact via an XML External Entity (XXE) attack.

criterions.comment: phpdocx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
